attributes.action: not allow criminals to claim asylum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thaksin Shinawatra is the former Prime Minister of Thailand who with his wife fled the country rather then face allegations of corruption. His wife also happens to be guilty of not paying millions in dollars worth of Tax. 

Now that they are in England he and his wife have applied for asylum.

Whether the allegations against the prime minister are true or not his wife has been found guilty in a court of law and should be sent back.

Please stop England from becoming a safe harbour for rich criminals and terrorists.
